page.title: 03RECREATION-SPORT.
page.content: Football is very popular with youngsters especially boys. There are school football teams and youth club teams. Most schools in the area have football teams, netball teams for girls, and athletics for both boys and girls. Golf is probably the next most popular sport. There is one golf course in this area, called Whinhill. Although both men and women play golf, in the East End of Greenock it is mostly men and youths who play. Jogging is becoming more popular and 2 or 3 marathons are held in the area. There is the Cue Ball Snooker Club which you can join when you are 18 and which has 28 tables. Many old age pensioners of both sexes spend their leisure time playing bowls. There are several bowling greens and recently a new indoor bowling green was opened.
